```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(tweets, aes(factor(num_urls)), fill=factor(is_fake_news)) + geom_bar(position="dodge") +
scale_y_continuous(labels=scales::percent) + 
facet_grid(~is_fake_news)
```
